unbbayes.prs.msbn
Class Link

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--unbbayes.prs.msbn.Link
public class Link
extends java.lang.Object

Link representing one Clique in the linkage tree. It has references to the host cliques on the two adjacents Sub-Networks. Used by the Linkage class.

Author:
michael
